1_executive_summary.title: NFL Scraper Expert Persona - Context Integration (v1.3.0 â†’ v1.4.0)
1_executive_summary.description: Integrate project navigation, onboarding guidance, and operational workflows from nfl-scraper-context.md into nfl-scraper-expert persona. This update addresses user feedback: 'why was it so hard to find how we are integrated with supabase?' by adding comprehensive navigation and setup instructions.
1_executive_summary.goal: Make nfl-scraper-expert persona immediately actionable for new agents by providing clear navigation to PROJECT-MAP.md, database connection instructions, validation scripts, and step-by-step onboarding checklist.
1_executive_summary.scope: Update nfl-scraper-expert.json system_prompt to include 5 new sections (Project Navigation, Database Connection, Validation Scripts, First-Time Agent Checklist, Updated Communication Style) without changing existing schema knowledge or scraper patterns.
out_of_scope: Changes to schema patterns (already correct in v1.3.0)
Changes to ESPN API integration knowledge
Creating new personas or modifying other persona files

risk_factors.risk: JSON syntax errors from unescaped characters in markdown
risk_factors.mitigation: Carefully escape all backslashes, quotes, and newlines. Test JSON validity before committing.
Only add new sections, do not modify existing Database Schema Knowledge section. Create backup before modifications.

risk_factors.risk: System prompt becoming too long (token limits)
risk_factors.mitigation: Keep additions concise. Total system_prompt should remain under 10,000 characters.

risk_factors.risk: Persona failing to activate after update
risk_factors.mitigation: Test activation with use_persona() tool immediately after changes. Restore from backup if failure.
